sentences.en: A soldier must give implicit obedience to his officers.
sentences.cn: 士兵必须绝对服从他的长官.

sentences.en: Do you think you can compel obedience from me?
sentences.cn: 你以为你能逼我服从 吗 ?

sentences.en: He acted in obedience to the orders of his superior.
sentences.cn: 他是遵照他的上级指示行动的.

sentences.en: He acts in unquestioning obedience to the orders of his superior.
sentences.cn: 他的行动绝对服从上级的命令.

sentences.en: I should be sorry to stake my authority on her obedience.
sentences.cn: 对温顺的她发号施令,我感到遗憾.

sentences.en: Isabella had been taught unquestioning obedience.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝拉被要求无条件服从。

sentences.en: It is impracticable for some parents to exact obedience of their children.
sentences.cn: 有些父母强令其子女服从是不现实的.

sentences.en: Nuns are under vows of poverty, chastity and obedience.
sentences.cn: 修女须立誓保持清贫 、 贞洁、顺从.

sentences.en: obedience classes for dogs and their owners
sentences.cn: 为狗和主人安排的服从训练课

sentences.en: Soldiers act in obedience to the orders of their superior officers.
sentences.cn: 士兵们遵照上级军官的命令行动.

sentences.en: The captain demanded obedience from his men.
sentences.cn: 这位上尉要求士兵服从他的指挥.

sentences.en: the Communist Party supported sanctions, in obedience to Soviet policy.
sentences.cn: 共产党遵照苏联政策，支持制裁。

sentences.en: The general expects complete obedience from his men.
sentences.cn: 这位将军要求他的士兵对他绝对服从.

sentences.en: The robber enforced obedience to their demand by threat of violence.
sentences.cn: 暴徒以暴力作威胁迫使服从他的要求.

sentences.en: They command the respect and obedience of the armed forces.
sentences.cn: 他们要求武装部队尊重上级，服从指挥。

sentences.en: They were evidently trying to frighten the public into obedience.
sentences.cn: 很明显,他们是要吓唬众人服从.

sentences.en: You will never force him into obedience.
sentences.cn: 你永远不能迫使他服从.

trans.tran_cn: 遵守，顺从，服从，（教会的）权威
trans.tran_en: when someone does what they are told to do, or what a law, rule etc says they must do
